name: BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON v. Stacy LINDSEY, et al.
name_abbreviation: Bank of N.Y. Mellon v. Lindsey

parties:
BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON
v.

attorneys: The defendant Heather Kryger's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40140) is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON
v.
Stacy LINDSEY, et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided October 25, 2017
Heather Kryger, self-represented, in support of the petition.
Peter A. Ventre, in opposition.
The defendant Heather Kryger's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40140) is denied.
